attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: i am an 18 year old with cystic fibrosis (CF) and i have just moved over to the adults side for my care..and i must say it is hurrendous! they have no money for staff..no money for mediciines to be done correctly, i think some money should be donated into this trust for Adults as well as children!...what do you all think?
